snippet: The mystery of how a church became a breeding ground for the brutal beating of two brothers continues to hang over a stretch of central New York, confounding even ex-congregants.

byline.contributor: Susan C. Beachy and Jack Begg contributed research.

abstract: Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, NY, is exposed as rife with culture of shame, abuse and paranoia after parents of 19-year-old Lucas Leonard are charged with manslaughter in his violent death at counseling session; his brother was also injured, and four other church members are charged with assault; mystery of how bible study group devolved into lethal sect continues.
